description: Technology configurations with resource profiles and info content

data.name: .NET
data.shortDescription: Cross-platform, high-performance framework for building modern cloud-based applications.
data.performanceNotes: Efficient CPU usage, low memory footprint, fast startup with Native AOT option.
data.useCases: Enterprise applications, microservices, high-performance APIs, Windows integration scenarios

data.name: Java
data.shortDescription: Enterprise-grade runtime with excellent ecosystem and mature tooling.
data.performanceNotes: Higher memory baseline due to JVM overhead. JIT optimization improves over time.
data.useCases: Legacy enterprise systems, Spring Boot microservices, Big data processing, Android development

data.name: Node.js
data.shortDescription: JavaScript runtime for event-driven, non-blocking I/O applications.
data.performanceNotes: Single-threaded, use cluster mode for CPU-intensive workloads. Very fast startup.
data.useCases: Real-time applications, API gateways, server-side rendering, I/O-bound microservices

data.name: Python
data.shortDescription: Versatile language for web, data science, ML, and automation.
data.performanceNotes: GIL limits parallelism. Use async frameworks or multiprocessing for CPU-bound workloads.
data.useCases: Data science, machine learning, automation, REST APIs with FastAPI

data.name: Go
data.shortDescription: Compiled language designed for simplicity, efficiency, and concurrency.
data.performanceNotes: Excellent CPU efficiency, very low memory footprint, instant startup with static binary.
data.useCases: Cloud-native microservices, CLI tools, high-performance APIs, infrastructure tooling

data.name: Mendix
data.shortDescription: Enterprise low-code platform for rapid application development.
data.performanceNotes: Higher resource usage due to Java-based runtime and model overhead. Plan for 2-3x more resources.
data.useCases: Rapid prototyping, business applications, workflow automation, enterprise integrations

data.name: OutSystems
data.shortDescription: High-performance low-code platform for enterprise applications.
data.performanceNotes: Platform overhead requires additional resources. Licensing based on Application Objects (AOs).
data.useCases: Full-stack enterprise apps, native mobile apps, legacy modernization, rapid development
